title: Got leaverban because league couldn't connect to the server?
body: The worked the last game I played, took like a five minute break; Nothing changed, at all. Connection didn't waver, internet didn't go down. I play another ranked game; "Unable to connect to server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect." Tried opening it in admin, same message; tried running w integrated graphics, same message, tried w High Performance NVIDIA Processor, same message. Over and over I try to connect; I see that my connection is fine. It Literally hasn't changed since that last game I played. I log in once more. I get leaverban :^) give me my money back rito

replies.body: Did you try updating or troubleshooting your connection to make sure your network was able to get a signal from our servers? It's not very uncommon to have a perfect signal to some servers and still not get any response from others simply due to how your connection is being routed, so it sounds like your network most likely just lost its link. Update a couple of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), specifically port forwarding and DNS server settings, to make sure you're able to get through to the game servers.
